name: NoirNights Vampyr
description:
Noir Nights - Vampyr is an vampire interactive fiction / Visual Novel  game built with Twine and featuring original art. I have tried to make a replayable experience in the spirit of classic adventure stories with some light casual RPG elements 

Become the ultimate vampire, or fight to regain your humanity as a new born vampire. Will your fully embrace your inner beast? Experience different characters, make morale choices that effect your final characters. Multiple endings and types of vampire you can become.
